::Cerberus::

    He looked back at this new bot, wondering who he is. He n=
odded his head at the other bot to let him know that he heard his statement=
 about Shredder. "If you hadn't noticed, the base is dead. If it was able t=
o be living again I wouldn't have gotten in. Keeping the computer terminals=
 on is a waste of energon, which that ship has plenty of. It was built for =
that. I suggest we salvage the ship and build a new base far from here."
  =
----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Yanshosh@... 
  To: nbwrpg@egroup=
s.com 
  Sent: Monday, October 16, 2000 6:25 AM
  Subject: Destrons


  ::S=
hredder::

  Shredder turns his head toward the scanners as he sees the apr=
oaching bots, 
  jumping up as one enters the base and destroys something.
=

  "Hey!" he yells, running out of the base, "What's the meaning of this? I=
 
  thought you were Destron?"

        eGroups Sponsor
